Topic.Title: Order of descriptions on room entry/look

Posts.EditableText:
Is there a way to re-order how things are listed when entering a room or performing a look? Currently, the default seems to be:

You are in Location
You can see Item
You can go N, S, E, W
Room description


I'd like to re-order it so it goes:

You are in Location
Room description
You can see Item
You can go N, S, E, W

Is there a way to do that?
Room description

Posts.EditableText:
Look on the 'Room Descriptions' tab in the editor.

It gives a list of the different lines in the room description, and there's a box to give each one a number for what order you want them to appear in.

Posts.EditableText: I find it's better to have the room description last as it can contain a lot of text describing where you are currently located and you can bring the objects into the room description making the text descriptions even longer.

Thanks for the help.

If anyone else stumbles across this and needs help, the "Room Descriptions" tab was not easy to find. It can be located by clicking on the "game" object, which has several tabs specific to that object.
